items.sentence: Tom came here this morning to give you this.
Tom came out of the house with his hands up.
Tom came to America as a stowaway on a ship.
Tom can eat just about anything but peanuts.
Tom told me that he liked working with Mary.
Tom took a selfie while flexing his muscles.
I don\'t like the idea of leaving Tom alone.
There were a number of students in the room.
I didn\'t need Tom\'s permission to do that.
Don\'t take pictures of me when I\'m eating.
Don\'t tell me you weren\'t doing something.
Tom thought Mary might\'ve been brainwashed.
Tom thought Mary wouldn\'t enjoy doing that.
The last thing I want to do is make Tom sad.
The only car Tom has ever driven is his own.
The pain went away because I took the pills.
The shoes I gave Tom were too small for him.
I\'m having a hard time with German grammar.
Tom\'s living room was tastefully furnished.
Why don\'t you go grab us a couple of beers?
